entities.name: Mrs Cole
entities.description: The housekeeper who is being questioned by Dumbledore about the deceased woman.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: A person who is questioning Mrs. Cole about the deceased woman.

entities.name: the boy
entities.description: The child whose mother has just died and whose father's identity is being discussed.

entities.name: Tom Riddle
entities.description: The name of the boy, given by his mother before she died.

relationships.description: Mrs. Cole told information about the boy to Dumbledore.
Dumbledore asked questions from Mrs. Cole about the deceased woman.
The boy is named after his father, Tom Riddle.
